name: Human readable graph file (HRGF)
short_description:
HRGF is a file format specification and library (libHRGF) for human readable graph structures.
It is continuing/extending the former GDF project which has been abandoned due to a name conflict with another project called "libgdf" (a file format for biosigns).
summary: An ASCII file format to specify generic graph structures
